title: [The Old One-Two, Work Room]
description: Fabric-swaddled walls give the small room a cozy appeal, while propped-open windows in the ceiling provide a small amount of airflow and allow for a modicum of light to penetrate the area.  A long knotty oak workbench at the back is riddled with tools and materials.  Standing opposite one another, a curtained archway leads into the main room of the shop and an unadorned exit provides egrees.
